title: Unpopluar opinion Remove ff
body:
I feel like around 90% of toxic players are people that dont want to play the game. Removing surrender vote will be the tilting point for them to quit league and then we'll have less toxic players because it removes their ablity to just stop playing so then they would just rather not play at all.

Riot, is good idea yes?

TL;DR being able to ff encorages toxic people to play league.
